title: Ellen Degeneres: Only Kind When the Cameras Are Rolling?
description:
Ellen Degeneres’ long time motto of “be kind to one another” is a sweet sentiment but has she been living by it? After years of complaints by former and current employees of her talk show, she’s stepping down as host.  She claims her departure has been in the works for years but others speculate it’s because of the numerous allegations of a hostile work environment.  Tune in as we break it all down!  

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
